explains: adv. 愚笨地；无聊地；可笑地

sentences.en: The Toad saw at once how wrongly and foolishly he had acted.
sentences.cn: 托德立刻明白他的行为是多么错误和愚蠢。

sentences.en: It is not at all likely that he will act so foolishly as that.
sentences.cn: 他决不会那样愚蠢地行事。

sentences.en: He admitted that he had acted foolishly.
sentences.cn: 他承认自己做得很愚蠢。
